languages.text: "Я не пропал. Я просто счел, что остальным не стоит видеть меня в моем состоянии". {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас искоса.{/n} "Тебе не стоит видеть меня в таком... сейчас мне уже лучше".

traits.locale_text: "Я не пропал. Я просто счел, что остальным не стоит видеть меня в моем состоянии". {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас искоса.{/n} "Тебе не стоит видеть меня в таком... сейчас мне уже лучше".

languages.text: "I did not disappear. I just thought that the others didn't need to see me in that state." {n}Heinrix casts a sidelong glance at you.{/n} "You don't need to see me like this either... I'm already on the mend, anyway."
languages.original_text: "Я не пропал. Я просто счел, что остальным не стоит видеть меня в моем состоянии". {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас искоса.{/n} "Тебе не стоит видеть меня в таком... сейчас мне уже лучше".

traits.locale_text: "I did not disappear. I just thought that the others didn't need to see me in that state." {n}Heinrix casts a sidelong glance at you.{/n} "You don't need to see me like this either... I'm already on the mend, anyway."

"I did not disappear. I just thought that the others didn't need to see me in that state." {n}Heinrix casts a sidelong glance at you.{/n} "You don't need to see me like this either... I'm already on the mend, anyway."

"I did not disappear. I just thought that the others didn't need to see me in that state." {n}Heinrix casts a sidelong glance at you.{/n} "You don't need to see me like this either... I'm already on the mend, anyway."

"I did not disappear. I just thought that the others didn't need to see me in that state." {n}Heinrix casts a sidelong glance at you.{/n} "You don't need to see me like this either... I'm already on the mend, anyway."

languages.text: “我并不是不见了，我只是觉得没必要让其他人看到我这个样子。”{n}海因里希瞥了你一眼。{/n}“你也没必要看到我这个样子……反正，我的情况已经在好转了。”
languages.original_text: "I did not disappear. I just thought that the others didn't need to see me in that state." {n}Heinrix casts a sidelong glance at you.{/n} "You don't need to see me like this either... I'm already on the mend, anyway."

traits.locale_text: “我并不是不见了，我只是觉得没必要让其他人看到我这个样子。”{n}海因里希瞥了你一眼。{/n}“你也没必要看到我这个样子……反正，我的情况已经在好转了。”

languages.text: «No he desaparecido. Solo pensaba que no hacía falta que los demás me vieran en ese estado». {n}Heinrix te mira de reojo.{/n} «Usted tampoco tenía por qué verme así... ya estoy recuperándome, de todos modos».
languages.original_text: "I did not disappear. I just thought that the others didn't need to see me in that state." {n}Heinrix casts a sidelong glance at you.{/n} "You don't need to see me like this either... I'm already on the mend, anyway."

traits.locale_text: «No he desaparecido. Solo pensaba que no hacía falta que los demás me vieran en ese estado». {n}Heinrix te mira de reojo.{/n} «Usted tampoco tenía por qué verme así... ya estoy recuperándome, de todos modos».

languages.text: 「俺は消えてはいない。ただ、あの状態の俺の姿を他人が見る必要はないと思っただけだ」{n}ハインリックスはあなたに横目で視線を送る。{/n}「あなたもこんな俺を見る必要はない…いずれにせよ、回復には向かっているんだ」
languages.original_text: "I did not disappear. I just thought that the others didn't need to see me in that state." {n}Heinrix casts a sidelong glance at you.{/n} "You don't need to see me like this either... I'm already on the mend, anyway."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は消えてはいない。ただ、あの状態の俺の姿を他人が見る必要はないと思っただけだ」{n}ハインリックスはあなたに横目で視線を送る。{/n}「あなたもこんな俺を見る必要はない…いずれにせよ、回復には向かっているんだ」

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas disparu. J'estimais simplement que les autres n'avaient pas à me voir dans cet état. Vous non plus, vous n'avez pas à me voir ainsi, {n}dit-il en vous lançant un regard en coin.{/n} De toute façon, je suis déjà en voie de guérison. »
languages.original_text: "I did not disappear. I just thought that the others didn't need to see me in that state." {n}Heinrix casts a sidelong glance at you.{/n} "You don't need to see me like this either... I'm already on the mend, anyway."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas disparu. J'estimais simplement que les autres n'avaient pas à me voir dans cet état. Vous non plus, vous n'avez pas à me voir ainsi, {n}dit-il en vous lançant un regard en coin.{/n} De toute façon, je suis déjà en voie de guérison. »

languages.text: "Ich war nicht verschwunden. Ich wollte nur nicht, dass mich die anderen in diesem Zustand sehen müssen." {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen Seitenblick zu.{/n} "Auch Ihr müsst mich nicht so ertragen ... Aber ich bin schon auf dem Weg der Besserung."
languages.original_text: "I did not disappear. I just thought that the others didn't need to see me in that state." {n}Heinrix casts a sidelong glance at you.{/n} "You don't need to see me like this either... I'm already on the mend, anyway."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war nicht verschwunden. Ich wollte nur nicht, dass mich die anderen in diesem Zustand sehen müssen." {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen Seitenblick zu.{/n} "Auch Ihr müsst mich nicht so ertragen ... Aber ich bin schon auf dem Weg der Besserung."

languages.text: "Ortadan kaybolmadım. Sadece diğerlerinin beni bu durumda görmelerine gerek olmadığını düşündüm." {n}Heinrix, sana göz ucuyla bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Senin de beni böyle görmene gerek yoktu... Hâlihazırda iyileşiyorum zaten."
languages.original_text: "I did not disappear. I just thought that the others didn't need to see me in that state." {n}Heinrix casts a sidelong glance at you.{/n} "You don't need to see me like this either... I'm already on the mend, anyway."
